name: Phantasmagoria 2
content:
game:
  game_id: sci
  path: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- write_file:
    content: '#!/bin/bash

      src=$1

      dst=$2

      cp -avr "$src/."  "$dst"'
    file: $CACHE/bulkcopy.sh
- chmodx: $CACHE/bulkcopy.sh
- insert-disc:
    description: Please insert disc 1
    requires: duk
- execute:
    args: $DISC $GAMEDIR
    file: $CACHE/bulkcopy.sh
- execute:
    args: -R 775  "$GAMEDIR"
    file: /bin/chmod
- execute:
    args: $GAMEDIR/RESOURCE.AUD  $GAMEDIR/RESAUD.001
    file: /bin/mv
- execute:
    args: $GAMEDIR/RESOURCE.SFX  $GAMEDIR/RESSFX.001
    file: /bin/mv
